title: Book Cover, "Selected Poems by Kenneth Patchen", 1946
medium: Offset lithograph on white coated paper
signed: Imprinted in red, upper right:  lustig
inscribed: Imprinted in black, lower center:  KENNETH PATCHEN; lower left quadrant:  selected poems; in red, upper right corner:  lustig; along spine (sideways), in red:  SELECTED POEMS; in black: KENNETH PATCHEN; on lower spine:  NC12
description: Drips and splattered forms in red (like blood) on white ground.  On the right a stick-like figure in black (whose head and neck take the form of an arrow) with arms raised and legs spread. Imprinted in black, lower center, name of author and at lower left, name of book.  Spine is imprinted in red an black with name of book and author and logo: NC 12.

tombstone.epitaph:
Book Cover, "Selected Poems by Kenneth Patchen", 1946.
1946. Offset lithograph on white coated paper. Gift of Susan Lustig Peck. 2001-29-8.
